title: AdTech 220-345-5 Hot Glue, 4 Inch Mini Size, Clear, 550 Sticks, Count
description: AdTech Crystal Clear Mini Glue Sticks bond to almost any materials whether its paper, metal, plastic, wood, fabric, ceramic, foam, lace, ribbon, synthetic fabric, and more! It bonds in less than 30 seconds and dries clear. Length: 4 inches, Diameter: 0.28 inches. Fits all mini size glue guns.
